judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Ronald T. Heiman, with him Rodgers, Marks & Perfilio, for appellants.
P. Raymond Bartholomew, with him Cusick, Madden, Joyce, McKay & Associates, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Wilson Adoption Case.
Argued October 1,1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Ronald T. Heiman, with him Rodgers, Marks & Perfilio, for appellants.
P. Raymond Bartholomew, with him Cusick, Madden, Joyce, McKay & Associates, for appellee.
October 16, 1974:
